summary: The diff shows the PortfolioGallery component was modified to use correct public asset paths with the .dim_800x600.png suffix. However, the diff is truncated, preventing full verification of all 120 images across all four categories. Evidence shows Home category implementation started but Commercial, Office, and Hotels categories are not visible in the truncated content.

missing_requirements.requirement: All 120 images (30 per category: Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels) must render successfully
missing_requirements.reason: Diff is truncated at home-16, showing only partial Home category. Cannot verify that all 30 Home images are complete, or that Commercial, Office, and Hotels categories (90 additional images) are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: 30 Commercial category images with retail/restaurant/showroom titles and descriptions
missing_requirements.reason: Commercial category not visible in truncated diff. Cannot verify implementation of 30 Commercial images with appropriate titles and descriptions.

missing_requirements.requirement: 30 Office category images with corporate workspace titles and descriptions
missing_requirements.reason: Office category not visible in truncated diff. Cannot verify implementation of 30 Office images with appropriate titles and descriptions.

missing_requirements.requirement: 30 Hotels category images with luxury hospitality titles and descriptions
missing_requirements.reason: Hotels category not visible in truncated diff. Cannot verify implementation of 30 Hotels images with appropriate titles and descriptions.

hallucinated_features.description: Image path uses .dim_800x600.png suffix instead of .png
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16 specifies filename pattern should be 'home-1.png through home-30.png' (and similar for other categories), but implementation uses '/assets/generated/home-1.dim_800x600.png' with .dim_800x600.png suffix not mentioned in requirements.
